funding-group.funding-statement: "This study was financially supported by the Department of Gynecologic Endocrinology and Fertility Disorders (Women’s Hospital, Ruprecht-Karls University of Heidelberg, Germany) and the German Research Foundation, DFG (grant: GE 1173/3-1 to A.G.). Sciomics GmbH provided funding for this study in the form of salaries for authors R.S. & C.S., but did not have any additional role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript. The specific roles of these authors are articulated in the ‘author contributions’ section." https://www.klinikum.uni-heidelberg.de/frauenklinik-zentrum/gynaekologische-endokrinologie-und-fertilitaetsstoerungen https://gepris.dfg.de/gepris/projekt/394654860?language=en.
